revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Rock Peak Ruins |image = [[File:Rock Peak Ruins.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Rock Peak Ruins. |tokens = 1,920,000 |location = Southeast of Giants Bed }} '''Rock Peak Ruins''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 31,507,840 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | {{Pokemon|Stonjourner}} || rowspan=8 colspan=2|<center>N/A |- | {{Pokemon|Rhyperior}} |- | {{Pokemon|Aggron}} |- | {{Pokemon|Coalossal}} |- | {{Pokemon|Barbaracle}} |- | {{Pokemon|Gigalith}} |- | {{Pokemon|Crustle}} |- | '''{{Pokemon|Aerodactyl}}*''' |}
'''*Note:''' Aerodactyl will only appear if the player has captured it previously.
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | {{Pokemon|Relicanth}} || <center>149,662,240 || rowspan=2 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | '''{{Pokemon|Regirock}}*''' || <center>157,539,200 |}
'''*Note:''' Must have made progress in [[Questlines#The_Ancient_Golems|The Ancient Golems]] Questline to unlock.
==Items==

Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 250 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || 1 || 37.87% || 36.66% || 34.80% || 31.60% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || 1 || 37.87% || 36.66% || 34.80% || 31.60% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Brown Shard}} || 1 || 10.11% || 10.69% || 11.59% || 13.14% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || 1 || 10.11% || 10.69% || 11.59% || 13.14% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Hard Stone}} || 1 || 1.35% || 1.77% || 2.41% || 3.51% |- | {{Bag2|Everstone}} || 1 || 1.35% || 1.77% || 2.41% || 3.51% |- | {{Bag2|Stone Plate}} || 1 || 1.35% || 1.77% || 2.41% || 3.51% |} </tab> </tabs>
